## Hello there! 👋

I'm Magdalena, a passionate software engineer dedicated to crafting innovative solutions with a focus on web development and backend systems. With expertise in Python, FastAPI, and Django REST, I thrive on tackling complex challenges and creating robust, user-centric applications. Follow along as I share my projects, insights, and journey in the world of software development.
Let's code and create together!
## Languages I chatter in and tools I wield like a mighty coding wizard 🧙‍♂️✨
